description.displayText: Natalia worked for us for about a year and was truly a godsend. She is extremely patient, loving, caring, fun, energetic, and creative. She assisted with my sons therapy and he hit so many developmental milestones thanks to her hard work and consistent effort. She really became part of our family and I would absolutely hire her again and recommend her to anybody looking for childcare. She has an amazing gift and would be a wonderful influence and addition to your child's life!

description.displayText: Natalia worked for us for 3 months, she is very kind and creative. She dealt with a hectic summer camp schedule, picking up both my kids and other kids and dropping them off at different locations. She made sure my kids had snacks and water, took them to the pool and to parks and on many adventures. She gave them baths and put them to bed. She is a great addition to any family. Our needs have changed as far as the amount of time we need someone else or we would still have her with us. Hire her, you won't be sorry.

description.displayText: Natalia responded to my job posting, and we emailed to set up an interview.  She proposed a time and I agreed to the time.  (She did not confirm, but I did not think it was necessary since she proposed the time).  She did not show up as scheduled, so I ended up taking a morning off work for nothing. Natalia did not respond to my inquiry as to whether she was running late and has not responded further.
